trans-unit.source: Right-click the API app project in Solution Explorer and select Publish to open the publish dialog.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the API app project in Solution Explorer and select Publish to open the publish dialog.

trans-unit.source: The publish profile that you created earlier should be pre-selected.
trans-unit.target: The publish profile that you created earlier should be pre-selected.

trans-unit.source: Click Publish to begin the deployment process.
trans-unit.target: Click Publish to begin the deployment process.

trans-unit.source: The Azure App Service Activity window shows the deployment progress.
trans-unit.target: The Azure App Service Activity window shows the deployment progress.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Status notification of the Azure App Service Activity window</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Status notification of the Azure App Service Activity window</linkText>

trans-unit.source: During this deployment process, Visual Studio automatically tries to restart the gateway.
trans-unit.target: During this deployment process, Visual Studio automatically tries to restart the gateway.

trans-unit.source: The gateway is a web app that handles administrative functions for all API apps in a resource group, and it has to be restarted to recognize changes in an API app's API definition or apiapp.json file.
trans-unit.target: The gateway is a web app that handles administrative functions for all API apps in a resource group, and it has to be restarted to recognize changes in an API app's API definition or apiapp.json file.

trans-unit.source: If you use another method to deploy an API app, or if Visual Studio fails to restart the gateway, you might have to restart the gateway manually.
trans-unit.target: If you use another method to deploy an API app, or if Visual Studio fails to restart the gateway, you might have to restart the gateway manually.

trans-unit.source: The following steps explain how to do that.
trans-unit.target: The following steps explain how to do that.

trans-unit.source: In your browser, go to the <link><linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: In your browser, go to the <link><linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the API app blade for the API app that you deployed.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the API app blade for the API app that you deployed.

trans-unit.source: For information about the API app blade, and how to find it, see Manage API apps.
trans-unit.target: For information about the API app blade, and how to find it, see Manage API apps.
